downloadTitle: Beat the Half-life (t ½) - Governing Your PPM Solution: Post-Implementation
downloadDescription: This white paper discusses how to set up a governance model for your Project Portfolio Management (PPM) solution.

downloadFile.name: Governing your PPM Solution Post Implementation.docx

detailsSection: This white paper discusses how to set up a governance model for your Project Portfolio Management (PPM) solution.  It was written by Prasanna Adavi, a senior EPM consultant with EPMA.
detailsSection_file_name: Governing your PPM Solution Post Implementation.docx
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
